EmailTemplate.description: Sends an email to the applicant to complete a report on their event grant.
EmailTemplate.name: ES Event Grant Report Outcome Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Business Incubation Grant Application-Program Reporting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Financial_Incentive__c.Contact__c},
Thanks again for involving the City of Toronto in your recent event - {!Financial_Incentive__c.Name_of_Event__c}. We appreciate the opportunity to be involved.
As part of our grant to support your program we require a small report on the activities delivered as part of the program. Could you please complete the following report form?
https://cityoftoronto.tfaforms.net/356055?tfa_2={!Financial_Incentive__c.Id}
Thanks and please keep us involved in your upcoming activities.
Regards,
Nina
Nina Gesa Economic Development Officer City of Toronto www.toronto.ca/business
